  <p>This course is designed for researchers, students, and practitioners, who wish to create a personal or project website using the Quarto framework.</p>

    <li>Create a GitHub account.</li>
    <li>Install required R packages: <code>install.packages(c("usethis", "gitcreds"))</code></li>
    <li>Ensure you are comfortable using `.qmd` files, the R Console, the Terminal, and basic GitHub navigation.</li>
